cyclone.name: FLORENCE
cyclone.current_location: about 410 mi south of Bermuda and 975 mi ESE of Cape Fear, North Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: The hurricane is moving west-northwest to northwest across the southwest Atlantic and is forecast to approach and strike the North Carolina/South Carolina coast late Thursday into Friday.
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: coast near Cape Fear, North Carolina (NC/SC border region)
